## Formatter type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Formatter<I, T extends Hashable, Q = never, S = T> = (input: I, rules: Iterable<Rule<I, T, Q, S>>, outcomes: Iterable<Outcome<I, T, Q, S>>) => Future.Maybe<string>;
```
